3946.verse: وَجَعَلُواْ|And they have made|157|163|5896$بَيْنَهُۥ|between Him|105|118|12602$وَبَيْنَ|and between|106|119|4873$ٱلْجِنَّةِ|the jinn|71|84|8786$نَسَبًا‌ۚ|a relationship,|113|126|12815$وَلَقَدْ|but certainly,|109|115|640$عَلِمَتِ|know|80|122|14737$ٱلْجِنَّةُ|the jinn|71|155|14738$إِنَّهُمْ|that they|83|167|106$لَمُحْضَرُونَ|(will) surely be brought.|178|220|14702$

3958.verse: فَكَفَرُواْ|But they disbelieved|154|196|14744$بِهِۦ‌ۖ|in it,|52|137|204$فَسَوْفَ|so soon|85|170|3931$يَعْلَمُونَ|they will know.|119|162|115$

3959.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And verily,|90|107|640$سَبَقَتْ|has preceded|109|144|8064$كَلِمَتُنَا|Our Word|82|116|14745$لِعِبَادِنَا|for Our slaves,|117|152|14746$ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ|the Messengers,|129|146|2247$

3960.verse: إِنَّهُمْ|Indeed they,|105|174|106$لَهُمُ|surely they|94|231|1027$ٱلْمَنصُورُونَ|(would be) the victorious.|192|260|14747$

3961.verse: وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|126|713$جُندَنَا|Our host|77|134|14748$لَهُمُ|surely, they|99|156|1027$ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ|(will be) those who overcome.|221|249|5074$

3963.verse: وَأَبْصِرْهُمْ|And see them,|117|205|14750$فَسَوْفَ|so soon|85|262|3931$يُبْصِرُونَ|they will see.|110|198|7019$

3965.verse: فَإِذَا|But when|82|104|1730$نَزَلَ|it descends|96|139|10576$بِسَاحَتِهِمْ|in their territory,|130|173|14751$فَسَآءَ|then evil (will be)|135|178|3997$صَبَاحُ|(the) morning|110|132|14752$ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ|(for) those who were warned.|219|219|8243$

3970.verse: وَٱلْحَمْدُ|And all praise|108|148|5596$لِلَّهِ|(be) to Allah,|108|187|6$رَبِّ|(the) Lord|87|166|7$ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ|(of) the worlds.|124|164|8$

3942.verse: What is [wrong] with you? How do you make judgement?

3943.verse: Then will you not be reminded?

3944.verse: Or do you have a clear authority?

3945.verse: Then produce your scripture, if you should be truthful.

3946.verse: And they have claimed between Him and the jinn a lineage, but the jinn have already known that they [who made such claims] will be brought to [punishment].

3947.verse: Exalted is Allah above what they describe,

3948.verse: Except the chosen servants of Allah [who do not share in that sin].

3949.verse: So indeed, you [disbelievers] and whatever you worship,

3950.verse: You cannot tempt [anyone] away from Him

3951.verse: Except he who is to [enter and] burn in the Hellfire.

3952.verse: [The angels say], "There is not among us any except that he has a known position.

3953.verse: And indeed, we are those who line up [for prayer].

3954.verse: And indeed, we are those who exalt Allah."

3955.verse: And indeed, the disbelievers used to say,

3956.verse: "If we had a message from [those of] the former peoples,

3957.verse: We would have been the chosen servants of Allah."

3958.verse: But they disbelieved in it, so they are going to know.

3959.verse: And Our word has already preceded for Our servants, the messengers,

3960.verse: [That] indeed, they would be those given victory

3961.verse: And [that] indeed, Our soldiers will be those who overcome.

3962.verse: So, [O Muhammad], leave them for a time.

3963.verse: And see [what will befall] them, for they are going to see.

3964.verse: Then for Our punishment are they impatient?

3965.verse: But when it descends in their territory, then evil is the morning of those who were warned.

3966.verse: And leave them for a time.

3967.verse: And see, for they are going to see.

3968.verse: Exalted is your Lord, the Lord of might, above what they describe.

3970.verse: And praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
